verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> Melchizedek <S%G3198><s%>, king <S%G935><s%> of Salem <S%G4532><s%>, priest <S%G2409><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> Most High <S%G5310><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> met <S%G4876><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> returning <S%G5290><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the slaughter <S%G2871><s%> of the kings <S%G935><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blessed <S%G2127><s%> him <S%G846><s%>,

to whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> divided <S%G3307><s%> a tenth part <S%G1181><s%> of <S%G575><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> (being first <S%G4412><s%>, <S%G3303><s%> by interpretation <S%G2059><s%>, King <S%G935><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> then <S%G1899><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of Salem <S%G4532><s%>, which is <S%G3603><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%>;

without father <S%G540><s%>, without mother <S%G282><s%>, without genealogy <S%G35><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> beginning <S%G746><s%> of days <S%G2250><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> made like <S%G871><s%> unto the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>), abideth <S%G3306><s%> a priest2409, 1519 continually <S%G1336><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> consider <S%G2334><s%> how great <S%G4080><s%> this man <S%G3778><s%> was <S%G3739><s%>, unto whom <S%G2532><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%>, the patriarch <S%G3966><s%>, gave <S%G1325><s%> a tenth <S%G1181><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the chief spoils <S%G2334><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they indeed3303, 2983 of <S%G1537><s%> the sons <S%G5207><s%> of Levi <S%G3017><s%> that receive <S%G2983><s%> the priest <S%G2405><s%>'s office have <S%G2192><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> to take tithes of <S%G586><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, that <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%>, of <S%G80><s%> their <S%G846><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, though <S%G2539><s%> these have come out <S%G1831><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the loins <S%G3751><s%> of Abraham <S%G11><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> he whose genealogy is <S%G1075><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> counted <S%G1075><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> hath taken tithes <S%G1183><s%> of Abraham <S%G11><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hath blessed <S%G2127><s%> him that hath <S%G2192><s%> the promises <S%G1860><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> dispute <S%G485><s%> the less <S%G1640><s%> is blessed <S%G2127><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the better <S%G2909><s%>.

And2532, Ezekiel3 here <S%G5602><s%> men <S%G444><s%> that die <S%G599><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> tithes <S%G1181><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> one <S%G3140><s%>, of whom it is witnessed <S%G3140><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he liveth <S%G2198><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, so <S%G5613><s%> to say <S%G2031><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> Levi <S%G3017><s%>, who receiveth <S%G2983><s%> tithes <S%G1181><s%>, hath paid tithes <S%G1183><s%>;

for <S%G1063><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the loins <S%G3751><s%> of his father <S%G3962><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> Melchizedek <S%G3198><s%> met <S%G4876><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Now if <S%G1487><s%> there <S%G3767><s%> was <S%G3303><s%> perfection5050, 2258 through <S%G1223><s%> the Levitical <S%G3020><s%> priesthood <S%G2420><s%> (for <S%G1063><s%> under <S%G1909><s%> it <S%G846><s%> hath the people <S%G2992><s%> received the law <S%G3549><s%>), what <S%G5101><s%> further <S%G2089><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> was there that <S%G450><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> priest <S%G2409><s%> should arise <S%G450><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchizedek <S%G3198><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be reckoned <S%G3004><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the order <S%G5010><s%> of Aaron <S%G2><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> the priesthood <S%G2420><s%> being changed <S%G3346><s%>, there is made <S%G1096><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> necessity <S%G318><s%> a change <S%G3331><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G3348><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> are said <S%G3004><s%> belongeth <S%G3348><s%> to <S%G5443><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> tribe <S%G5443><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> hath given attendance <S%G4337><s%> at the altar <S%G2379><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it is evident <S%G4271><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> hath sprung <S%G393><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> Judah <S%G2448><s%>; as to <S%G1519><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> tribe <S%G5443><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> priests <S%G2420><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> what we say is <S%G2076><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> more <S%G4054><s%> abundantly evident <S%G2612><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the likeness <S%G3665><s%> of Melchizedek <S%G3198><s%> there ariseth <S%G450><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> priest <S%G2409><s%>,

who <S%G3739><s%> hath been made <S%G1096><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of a <S%G1785><s%> carnal <S%G4559><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of an <S%G2222><s%> endless <S%G179><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> it is witnessed <S%G3754><s%> of him <S%G4771><s%>, Thou art a priest <S%G2409><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> After <S%G2596><s%> the order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchizedek <S%G3198><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> there is1096, Ezekiel3 a disannulling <S%G115><s%> of a foregoing <S%G4254><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of its <S%G846><s%> weakness <S%G772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unprofitableness <S%G512><s%>

(for <S%G1063><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> made <S%G5048><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> perfect <S%G5048><s%>), and a <S%G1680><s%> bringing in <S%G1898><s%> thereupon of a <S%G1680><s%> better <S%G2909><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we draw nigh <S%G1448><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> inasmuch <S%G2596><s%> as <S%G3745><s%> it is not <S%G3756><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> the taking of an oath <S%G3728><s%>

(for1063, Ezekiel3 they indeed have been <S%G1526><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> priests <S%G2409><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> an oath <S%G3728><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> he with <S%G3326><s%> an oath <S%G3728><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%> that saith <S%G3004><s%> of <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, The Lord <S%G2962><s%> sware <S%G3660><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will <S%G3338><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> repent <S%G3338><s%> himself <S%G4771><s%>, Thou art a priest <S%G2409><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%>);
by <S%G2596><s%> so much <S%G5118><s%> also hath <S%G1096><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> the surety <S%G1450><s%> of a <S%G1242><s%> better <S%G2909><s%> covenant <S%G1242><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G1526><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> have been <S%G1526><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> priests <S%G2409><s%> many <S%G4119><s%> in number <S%G1223><s%>, because that by death <S%G2288><s%> they are hindered <S%G2967><s%> from continuing <S%G3887><s%>:

but1161, 3588 he <S%G846><s%>, because <S%G1223><s%> he <S%G846><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%>, hath <S%G2192><s%> his priesthood <S%G2420><s%> unchangeable <S%G531><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G3606><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> he is able <S%G1410><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the uttermost <S%G3838><s%> them <S%G3838><s%> that draw near <S%G4334><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, seeing he <S%G2198><s%> ever <S%G3842><s%> liveth <S%G2198><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> make intercession <S%G1793><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a high priest <S%G749><s%> became <S%G4241><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>, holy <S%G3741><s%>, guileless <S%G172><s%>, undefiled <S%G283><s%>, separated <S%G5563><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> higher <S%G5308><s%> than the heavens <S%G3772><s%>;

who3739, 2192 needeth <S%G318><s%> not3756, 2596 daily <S%G2250><s%>, like <S%G5618><s%> those high priests <S%G749><s%>, to offer up <S%G399><s%> sacrifices <S%G2378><s%>, first <S%G4386><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>, and then <S%G1899><s%> for the sins of the people <S%G2992><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> he did <S%G4160><s%> once <S%G2178><s%> for all <S%G399><s%>, when he offered up himself <S%G1438><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> appointeth <S%G2525><s%> men <S%G444><s%> high priests <S%G749><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> infirmity <S%G769><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the oath <S%G3728><s%>, which was <S%G3588><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, appointeth a Son <S%G5207><s%>, perfected <S%G5048><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> evermore <S%G165><s%>.
